name: Flying Package
description:
Flying package is a game developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

The game is about flying a delivery drone which can grab packages and drop them at their respective addresses.

The main challenge in the game is the limited battery capacity of the drone, which needs to visit a charging station frequently.

Some charging stations are missing their power cables but the flying machine is apparently also a maintenance drone which is capable of repairing the broken equipment.

Deliver all the packages to their respective addresses without running out of battery and you win.

The game uses keyboard input only.

Navigate through the menus with W, A, S, D and select with Enter.

***

The game is running on a custom engine written by me, which I unofficially call "Jam game engine"

You can check the egine development files on GitHub:

https://github.com/ZamfirYonchev/Jam-game-engine
